name: KABBAGE, INC.
sampleDescriptions: Educate Members of Congress and the Administration on non-bank lending; monitor and discuss H.R. 3299 / S. 1642, the Protecting Consumers' Access to Credit Act of 2017; monitor S. 2155, the Economic Growth, Regulatory Relief, and Consumer Protection Act, and advocate for the inclusion  of H.R. 3299 / S. 1642.

Monitor and discuss H.R. 3860 / S. 1958, the IRS Data Verification Modernization Act of 2017; monitor S. 2155, the Economic Growth, Regulatory Relief, and Consumer Protection Act, and advocate for the inclusion  of H.R. 3860 / S. 1958.
Monitor H.R. 1625, the Consolidated Appropriations Act of 2018 (P.L. 115-141).

Monitor and discuss H.R. 4439, the Modernizing Credit Opportunities Act; monitor and discuss Department of Treasury Financial Crimes Enforcement Network Customer Due Diligence Requirements for Financial Institutions, RIN 1506-AB25, Docket Number FinCEN 2016-10567 - provisions related to identifying and verifying the identity of beneficial owners.

Educate Members of Congress and the Administration on non-bank lending; monitor and discuss H.R. 3299 / S. 1642, the Protecting Consumers' Access to Credit Act of 2017; monitor S. 2155, the Economic Growth, Regulatory Relief, and Consumer Protection Act, and advocate for the inclusion  of H.R. 3299 / S. 1642; monitor and discuss the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency's Special Purpose National Bank (SPNB) charter proposal for fintech companies.

Monitor and discuss H.R. 3860 / S. 1958, the IRS Data Verification Modernization Act of 2017; monitor the Economic Growth, Regulatory Relief, and Consumer Protection Act (P.L. 115-174) and advocate for the inclusion  of H.R. 3860 / S. 1958; monitor H.R. 5445, the 21st Century IRS Act.
Monitor legislation and developments regarding data privacy, data security, and data use.
Educate Members of Congress and the Administration on non-bank lending; monitor H.R. 1509 / S. 656, the SAFE Lending Act of 2019.
Monitor and discuss H.R. 1957 / S. 928, the Taxpayer First Act of 2019.

Educate Members of Congress and the Administration on non-bank lending; monitor H.R. 1509 / S. 656, the SAFE Lending Act of 2019; monitor the establishment of the House Financial Services FinTech and Artificial Intelligence Task Forces.

Educate Members of Congress and the Administration on non-bank lending; monitor H.R. 1509 / S. 656, the SAFE Lending Act of 2019; monitor the House Financial Services FinTech and Artificial Intelligence Task Forces; monitor H.R. 4047, the Open Banking Study Act of 2019.
Educate Members on FinTech provisions in COVID legislation, including H.R. 748, the CARES Act.

Educate Members of Congress and the Administration on non-bank lending; monitor H.R. 1509 / S. 656, the SAFE Lending Act of 2019; monitor the House Financial Services FinTech and Artificial Intelligence Task Forces; monitor H.R. 4047, the Open Banking Study Act of 2019; educate Members on FinTech provisions in COVID legislation, including H.R. 748, the CARES Act.

Educate Members on legislative proposals to amend the SBA Paycheck Protection Program, including H.R. 7010, the Paycheck Protection Program Flexibility Act of 2020, and H.R. 266, Paycheck Protection Program and Health Care Enhancement Act.

Educate Members of Congress and the Administration on non-bank lending; monitor H.R. 1509 / S. 656, the SAFE Lending Act of 2019; monitor the House Financial Services FinTech and Artificial Intelligence Task Forces; monitor H.R. 4047, the Open Banking Study Act of 2019; educate Members on FinTech provisions in COVID legislation, including H.R. 748, the CARES Act; educate policymakers on true lender regulation.
Educate lawmakers on company's participation in COVID-19 small business lending program.
Educate Members of Congress on Paycheck Protection Program (PPP) related issues.
Monitor Paycheck Protection Program (PPP) related issues.
